site_name: The Bilton Centre, Metropolitan Police Car Pound Unit 16 Walmgate Road
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
T3215 Goat Willow, T2182 Sycamore, N2181 Field Maple, N2180 Field Maple, T2177 Field Maple, T2174 Norway Maple, T2173 Norway Maple, T2170 Walnut, T2169 Tree of Heaven, T2165 Acer cappadocium, T2164 Tree of Heaven, T2162 Acer cappadocium, T2159 Alder, T2158 Alder, T2157 Ash, T2155 Ash, T2153 Alder, T2152 Tree of Heaven, T2150 Holly Oak, T2149 London Plane, NG3326 2 No. Leylandi & 1 No. Oak and N1/2147 Acer cappadocium- Prune all overhanging branches back to the boundary for the full height of the trees 
T2163 Willow-Re-pollard to previous pollard points.
